mapper.select: SELECT a.id FROM bu_shopowner b LEFT JOIN bu_member_info a ON a.id = b.member_id WHERE a.del_flag = '0' AND b.del_flag = '0' AND a.nova_project_end_date > now() and DATE_SUB(a.nova_project_end_date, interval 10 day) <= now() AND DATE_ADD(a.nova_project_begin_date, INTERVAL 4 YEAR) > NOW()
